import React,{useEffect,useState}from "react"; import "../styles.css"; import Base from "./Base"; import ImageHelper from "./helper/Image"; import { loadcart } from './helper/Carthelper' export default function Shoppingcart() { const [products,setProducts]=useState([]) useEffect(()=> { setProducts(loadcart()); },[]) return (

Shopping Cart

{products.map((product,index)=>(

{product.name}

{product.description}

+
1
-
{product.price}
Remove
) )}
Sub-Total
2 items
$6.18


); }
